attributes.description: Ramseygems.com is the place to find out facts about gems and jewelry.  While many people are interested in gems and jewelry it can be difficult to find reliable, understandable information about this interesting subject.  With the expertise of many years in the gem and jewelry business John and Laura Ramsey bring an understandable and interesting group of facts and photos to their website: Ramseygems.com
attributes.title: John and Laura Ramsey
